Whereabouts

I currently live in Copenhagen, Denmark, but I have been fortunate enough to spend 2 1/2 years of the last 5 outside Denmark, combining traveling and working, exploring cities and places all around the world.

I lived in Chiang Mai, Thailand on an off for almost a year... working online and studying bodywork and buddhism. 4-5 months of 2014 was spend in the inspirational bay area by San Francisco, and in 2015 I worked from Bangkok, Thailand and Cape Town, South Africa.
